projects.title: Pencil
projects.desc: A static web page created to practice HTML and CSS. Used flex box to achieve responsive sizing.

projects.title: Mass Shooting Data
projects.desc: Grabs mass shooting data from a .csv file by calling an Ajax request. Parses the data with Papa Parse, and displays the data with Leaflet and Table

projects.title: Tweeter
projects.desc: A web page that users can sign up, sign in, upload posts, and likes. Used firebase for user authentication and data storage.

projects.title: Spotify
projects.desc: A user can type in a song or an artist to get a list of tracks. A user also can click on the tracks to preview the song. Used Sptify api and React.
